column1: One day @entity0 the puppy went outside to play. He ran around the yard as fast as he could. After running, @entity0 began to play with his ball. When @entity0 was tired of that, @entity0 play catch with @entity1. @entity0 was very happy when @entity1 wanted to play with him. @entity0 would jump on @entity1 and start to lick her face. @entity1 was happy when @entity0 showed her all that love. Later on @entity1 and @entity0 went inside to eat and take a nap.
@placeholder did @entity0 do when he was outside
he sat down and took a nap.
